articles.title: 25 Best Cyber Monday Laptop Deals: Save Up To 60% On Models From Dell, HP, Apple, Samsung And More - Forbes
articles.description: Cyber Monday 2020 has arrived with a bang. Save as much as 60% on Chromebooks, 2-in-1s, desktop replacements, gaming laptops and more from Apple, Dell, HP, Lenovo and other brands.
